entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 60%
